alert.note: Alert for Cannon; De Kalb; Rutherford; Smith; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Smith, northwestern De Kalb, northeastern Rutherford, southeastern Wilson and northwestern Cannon Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Woodbury, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Watertown, Gordonsville, Walterhill, Hickman, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty, Auburntown, Lascassas, Tuckers Crossroads, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park and Milton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 232 and 260. Interstate 840 between mile markers 72 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; De Kalb; Rutherford; Smith; Wilson
